title: FS: T206 Fred Merkle (Port.) SGC 86, Half PSA price....
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Fred Merkle (Port.) SGC 86, Half PSA price....
posts.post_content: 50/50 centering, bright white borders, and very sharp corners. Extremely clean Pied 150 back. A PSA 7.5 just went for $2700 at Goodwin last Thursday. My scanner is down, but I can send pics if you send me your email. Priced at about half what the Goodwin card went for, $1575 delivered...
